message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is quite high.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your understanding of the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. How about $11,500?
